snippet: Transit apps and virtual tour guides can get you around the city and through its popular landmarks, like the Louvre.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares applications that help travelers navigate Paris; recommends Star Walk Kids app for children interested in astronomy.
lead_paragraph: Transit apps and virtual tour guides can get you around the city and through its popular landmarks, like the Louvre.

headline.print_headline: See the City of Lights in a Whole New Light
headline.main: Using Your Phone to See Paris in a Whole New Light
